title: 地皮世界刷怪 怎么开和平
author: qq502024528
txt_content:
RT  用的MV插件   /mv modify set diff 0 plotworld  这种的当时打有用  重启完 又刷怪了  
 求个好用的办法  配置文件那也改成和平了

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
plotworld:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: "&2\u5730\u76ae\u4e16\u754c"
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: EASY
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'false'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: 0.0
      pitch: 0.0
      z: 3.5
      y: 66.0
      x: 3.5
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '-854451000442004703'
    generator: PlotMe
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'复制代码

讲解一下，你首先把difficult改成peaceful，不改也没关系
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
下边这个。monsters 的spawn改成false
就是关闭该世界的怪物生成，望采纳为最佳答案，谢谢

replies.author: HuaiYang
replies.txt_content:
@qq502024528 

/gamerule doMobSpawning false ←禁止天然刷怪
/difficulty 0 ←更改难度

如对您有帮助请选择"最佳答案"！
